reviewText: Three stories of unhappy maidens forced to do menial chores, who find their Prince Charming through a lost shoe: 1. Cinderella (France): Her stepsisters will never make fun of Cinderella again, thanks to help from a fairy godmother. 2. Maria Cinderella (Chile): Maria gets a magic wand and more from a kind lady in the woods -- a gold star for her forehead. 3. The Maiden, The Frog, and the Chef's Son (Nigeria): When a mistreated girl feeds the frogs in the river, the 'King of the Frogs' decides to reward her.
